trans-unit.source: Generate TTL based self expiring crumbs (token).
trans-unit.target: Generar migajas autoexpirables basadas en TTL (token).

trans-unit.source: ` >>> from crumb import Crumb >>> >>> # generate crumb for user that expires in 30 seconds >>> c = Crumb('tim@tom.com', 30, secret='!@#$') >>> c.generate() 830b60fe77b2 >>> >>> # key attribute also contains the generated crumb >>> print c.key 830b60fe77b2 >>> >>> # verify the generated crumb >>> c = Crumb('tim@tom.com', 30, secret='!@#$',key='830b60fe77b2') >>> c.validate() True >>> >>> # try to verify again after 60 sec >>> c.validate() False `
trans-unit.target: `>>> from crumb import Crumb >>> >>> # generar miga para el usuario que caduca en 30 segundos >>> c = Crumb ('tim@tom.com ', 30, secret ='! @ # $ ') >>> c.generate () 830b60fe77b2 >>> >>> # El atributo clave también contiene la miga generada >>> print c.key 830b60fe77b2 >>> >>> # verifica la miga generada >>> c = Crumb (' tim@tom.com ', 30, secret ='! @ # $ ', key =' 830b60fe77b2 ') >>> c.validate () True >>> >>> # intenta verificar nuevamente después de 60 segundos >>> c.validate () Falso `
